Quality Service Guaranteed!

When you need a plumber that will get the job done right the first time (at a price that won't break the bank) call the experts at Imlay Plumbing.

 

Our team of licensed plumbers are trained to handle any residential or commercial plumbing jobs. Kadin Imlay and his team deliver quality, professional services every time they are called upon.

Contact Us See Our Services

Services Offered

View all

We lead the way in plumbing services for Iron County and offer a wide range of services for both residential and commercial clients.

General Plumbing

We repair and replace faucets, toilets, fixtures, and other plumbing fixtures. We can find and repair leaks, slow drains, and other general plumbing issues!

Water Softening & Treatment

We install softeners, filters, RO, and other water treatment systems.

Water Heating

We install and service both tank and tankless heating systems.

Drain Cleaning & Inspection

Have a clogged drain or toilet? We have a wide variety of drain cleaning tools and equipment to get the job done right.

Plumbing Design

Let us help design your plumbing system on new construction and remodels.

Sewer Line Replacement

If your main sewer is damaged or clogged we can help. We can repair or replace with newer, stronger, and more root resistant Schedule 40 PVC.

Satisfied Clients

We are an award winning company with over 20 years in business and a passionate customer base. We love our clients and they love our work.

Amy Kartchner Bates

So impressed/grateful for Imlay plumbing! We had emergency after hours (day before first day of school no less) and they sent Kadin out to help us! He was so friendly and nice (even with my kids trying to "help" him) and with the late night. Very professional and helpful!

Anna McFadden

Imlay came out as soon as they could and succeeded where another Plumber failed. They saved our landlord thousands by telling us the correct problem and what would need to be done! I highly suggest you call Imlay if you need help, and if they can’t help you they will tell you who can. They are honest and they are now my go to plumber!

James Riley

Came to the rescue when my main line failed. It took a while to identify the issues and a couple of days to repair. Excavation crew was efficient and courteous. Easy 5 stars.

John Wardenburg

Had an emergency and Imlay plumbing came to the rescue. They were on time in showing up to the house, professional in every way! I would recommend them for any plumbing needs!

Pat Wall

We had a pipe burst in our wall at 4:45 this morning. I called their number at 7:30AM, Spencer showed up at 9:30, removed our water heater, diagnosed and fixed the broken pipe, and was on his way by 10:45! His services were greatly appreciated on a Saturday morning! Imlay Plumbing now has a customer for life!

Susan Christiansen

We are having our shower redone. Cam was completing the project. He was wonderful to work with. Very courteous, professional and detail oriented. The job was done professionally and on time. And the cleanup was spotless. So glad we chose to Imlay Plumbing do our project. Will use them for all our plumbing needs. Thanks again Cam for a job well done.

K Vochatzer

Kasey and Kadin at Imlay Plumbing treated me with courtesy and respect. They went beyond the expected in my situation to give honest advice on what was necessary and what was not for my septic system. They even found me a concrete lid to replace mine that disintegrated. Thank you Imlay!

Tiffany Chavez

Super professional, friendly, very clean. Cleaned up so well you wouldn't have known they were even there. Fixed out water issues and even took the time to see if my cat had snuck into their truck after they left and I couldn't find him! Super caring company, honest and professional. I have nothing but good to say about them.
